titleInfo.title: W. D. Abernathy to bond R. P. Curran as Superintendent of Public Instruction

subject.topic: Abernathy, William D.; Mason, Isaac; Abernathy, Thomas A.; Curran, Robert P.

mods.note: William D. Abernathy, Trustee for Giles County, along with Isaac Mason and Thomas A. Abernathy state that they are bonded to Robert P. Curran, Superintendent of Public Instruction, and his successors to that position for the sum of $4,489.16.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
